thread.title: Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez Show PDA on Date at Yankees Spring Training Game

author: Alex Ungerman
title: Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez Show PDA on Date at Yankees Spring Training Game
text: Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez Show PDA on Date at Yankees Spring Training Game by Alex Ungerman 11:50   Playing Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez Show PDA on Date at Yankees Spring Training Game Take her out to a ball game! Jennifer Lopez and Alex Rodriguez's relationship continues to heat up as the couple was spotted sitting next to each other while riding on the back of a golf cart on Saturday at the New York Yankeesâ€™ spring training game against the Baltimore Orioles in Tampa, Florida. "They looked comfortable with each other and were seen holding hands," an eyewitness tells ET. "They were waving to fans as they drove away on the golf cart." Photo: MEGA Despite retiring from professional baseball last year, A-Rod is still involved with the MLB team, while J.Lo, a Bronx, New York, native herself, rocked a blue Yankees hat to show her support. This was the latest outing in the couple's romantic Florida trip. Last week, the Shades of Blue star sizzled in a leggy white mini-dress while on a dinner date with the former athlete. Watch the video below for the home run fashion. RELATED SLIDESHOW
